messages.title: Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.
messages.content: If you're anything like me, when you look around Portsmouth, the country and the world there is a lot that you want to change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need a city with decent homes for local people.
We need top-class education and health services to give young people the best chance to get on in life.

We need fairer taxes so people just starting their career get to keep more of the money they earn, at the time in life when they need it the most and more high quality jobs so that people have meaningful employment.
We need real protection for our environment, and to grow job prospects by increasing our trade with Europe and the rest of the world.

mentions.tacticalSituation: On 7th May, the fight here is between myself and the Conservatives â€“ only a Lib Dem or Conservative has won this seat in the last 100 years.

issues.economy: We need real protection for our environment, and to grow job prospects by increasing our trade with Europe and the rest of the world.
issues.education: We need top-class education and health services to give young people the best chance to get on in life.
issues.environment: Lib Dems in Portsmouth have been campaigning hard to prevent over-development on our precious green space at the St James' Hospital site and making sure the mental health facilities there stay open.
issues.health: We need top-class education and health services to give young people the best chance to get on in life.

housing.content: We need a city with decent homes for local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: That's what makes me want to fight for Portsmouth South in this election.

images.caption: Gerald Vernon-Jackson - Lib Dem Parliamentary Candidate for Portsmouth South
It's Lib Dem or Conservative here... (bar chart showing projected vote percentages)

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Please lend me your support on 7th May so that I can fight for the future that Portsmouth and Britain deserves.
